title: IP troubles
body:
I find it hard to save up 6300 IP and was wondering if the update in November will make it easier? Also for now I have about 2k IP, and the grind it real XD                     


                                                                                                         {{champion:245}}

replies.body: The only way to gain IP is by playing matches, and 'pvp' matchmade games give a bit more at that. It might be worth it to look up on the [**Blue Essence update**](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/) that's coming soon, since that will be doing away with IP altogether and combining it and Blue Essence.
